name: chainmind
description: Decentralized AI Compute Marketplace - Connecting AI developers with GPU providers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:contracts"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../smart-contracts && npm install
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npm run typecheck && cd ../backend && npm run typecheck
scripts.railway:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && npm start
scripts.railway:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && npm start
scripts.deploy:railway: echo 'Deploy backend and frontend separately on Railway dashboard'

author: ChainMind Team
